Annotations.Annotation: Cube Schema for CCRS - Joint Communication & Advocacy Profile

ExpressionView.SQL: select M.ID, COALESCE(FOR_WHICH_ISSUES_ADDRESSED_STRATEGY_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as FOR_WHICH_ISSUES_ADDRESSED_STRATEGY_ID, CP1.DESIGNATION, CP1.ENTITY_YEAR, COALESCE(COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, COALESCE(SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY FROM CP6JOINT_ADVOCACY_STRATEGIES_ON_NORMATIVE_ISSUES M JOIN CP6JOINT_COMMUNICATION_ADVOCACY CP6 ON M.PARENT_ID = CP6.ID JOIN CP1GENERAL_PROFILE CP1 ON CP1.DESIGNATION = CP6.DESIGNATION AND CP1.ENTITY_YEAR = CP6.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN BASE_COUNTRY bc ON CP1.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 JOIN v_cp_validated_designations v ON CP1.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = CP1.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN CATEGORY COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID on CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID=COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID on CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID=SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY FOR_WHICH_ISSUES_ADDRESSED_STRATEGY_ID ON M.FOR_WHICH_ISSUES_ADDRESSED_STRATEGY_ID=FOR_WHICH_ISSUES_ADDRESSED_STRATEGY_ID.ID WHERE CP1.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND CP1.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO'

SELECT M.ID, COALESCE(FOR_WHICH_ISSUES_ADDRESSED_STRATEGY_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as FOR_WHICH_ISSUES_ADDRESSED_STRATEGY_ID, CP1.DESIGNATION, CP1.ENTITY_YEAR, COALESCE(COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, COALESCE(SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY FROM cp6joint_advocacy_strategies_onsdgs M JOIN CP6JOINT_COMMUNICATION_ADVOCACY CP6 ON M.PARENT_ID = CP6.ID JOIN CP1GENERAL_PROFILE CP1 ON CP1.DESIGNATION = CP6.DESIGNATION AND CP1.ENTITY_YEAR = CP6.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN BASE_COUNTRY bc ON CP1.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 JOIN v_cp_validated_designations v ON CP1.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = CP1.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN CATEGORY COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID on CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID=COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID on CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID=SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY FOR_WHICH_ISSUES_ADDRESSED_STRATEGY_ID ON M.for_which_issues_addressed_strategy_id=FOR_WHICH_ISSUES_ADDRESSED_STRATEGY_ID.ID WHERE CP1.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND CP1.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO'

select cp6.ID, cp6.DESIGNATION, cp6.ENTITY_YEAR, COALESCE(UNCT_ADVOCACY_MODEL_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as UNCT_ADVOCACY_MODEL_ID, COALESCE(COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, COALESCE(SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_COMMONUNCTWEBSITE = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_COMMONUNCTWEBSITE_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_COMMONUNCTWEBSITE WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_COMMONUNCTWEBSITE, cp6.COMMONUNCTURL, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_COMMON_FACEBOOK_PAGE = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_COMMON_FACEBOOK_PAGE_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_COMMON_FACEBOOK_PAGE WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_COMMON_FACEBOOK_PAGE, cp6.COMMON_FACEBOOKURL, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_COMMON_TWITTER_ACCOUNT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_COMMON_TWITTER_ACCOUNT_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_COMMON_TWITTER_ACCOUNT WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_COMMON_TWITTER_ACCOUNT, cp6.TWITTER_HANDLE, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_COMMON_YOUTUBE_ACCOUNT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_COMMON_YOUTUBE_ACCOUNT_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_COMMON_YOUTUBE_ACCOUNT WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_COMMON_YOUTUBE_ACCOUNT, cp6.COMMON_YOUTUBE_HANDLE, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_COMMON_INSTAGRAM_ACCOUNT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_COMMON_INSTAGRAM_ACCOUNT_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_COMMON_INSTAGRAM_ACCOUNT WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_COMMON_INSTAGRAM_ACCOUNT, cp6.COMMON_INSTAGRAM_HANDLE, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_COMMON_FLICKR_ACCOUNT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_COMMON_FLICKR_ACCOUNT_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_COMMON_FLICKR_ACCOUNT WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_COMMON_FLICKR_ACCOUNT, cp6.COMMON_FLICKR_HANDLE, cp6.COORDINATOR_TWITTER_HANDLE, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_COORDINATOR_TWITTER_ACCOUNT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_COORDINATOR_TWITTER_ACCOUNT_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_COORDINATOR_TWITTER_ACCOUNT WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_COORDINATOR_TWITTER_ACCOUNT, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_GUIDING_PRINCIPLES_COMMON_MESSAGING = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_GUIDING_PRINCIPLES_COMMON_MESSAGING_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_GUIDING_PRINCIPLES_COMMON_MESSAGING WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_GUIDING_PRINCIPLES_COMMON_MESSAGING, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_JOINT_ADVOCACY_STRATEGIES_ON_NORMATIVE_ISSUES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_JOINT_ADVOCACY_STRATEGIES_ON_NORMATIVE_ISSUES_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_JOINT_ADVOCACY_STRATEGIES_ON_NORMATIVE_ISSUES WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_JOINT_ADVOCACY_STRATEGIES_ON_NORMATIVE_ISSUES, CASE WHEN cp6.IS_COMMUNICATIONS_PART_OFUNDAF = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as IS_COMMUNICATIONS_PART_OFUNDAF_COUNT, CASE cp6.IS_COMMUNICATIONS_PART_OFUNDAF WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as IS_COMMUNICATIONS_PART_OFUNDAF, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_COMMUNICATION_TOGETHER_IN_TIME_CRISIS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_COMMUNICATION_TOGETHER_IN_TIME_CRISIS_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_COMMUNICATION_TOGETHER_IN_TIME_CRISIS WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_COMMUNICATION_TOGETHER_IN_TIME_CRISIS, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_VISUAL_IDENTITY_ESTABLISHED = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_VISUAL_IDENTITY_ESTABLISHED_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_VISUAL_IDENTITY_ESTABLISHED WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_VISUAL_IDENTITY_ESTABLISHED, CASE cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY, CASE WHEN cp6.hasunicintegration = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as hasunicintegration_count, CASE cp6.hasunicintegration WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as hasunicintegration_dim, CASE WHEN cp6.colocated_withrco = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as colocated_withrco_count, CASE cp6.colocated_withrco WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as colocated_withrco_dim, CASE WHEN cp6.has_joint_advocacy_strategies_onsdgs = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as has_joint_advocacy_strategies_onsdgs_count, CASE cp6.has_joint_advocacy_strategies_onsdgs WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as has_joint_advocacy_strategies_onsdgs_dim from CP6JOINT_COMMUNICATION_ADVOCACY cp6 JOIN CP1GENERAL_PROFILE cp1 ON cp6.DESIGNATION = cp1.DESIGNATION AND cp6.ENTITY_YEAR = cp1.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN BASE_COUNTRY bc ON cp6.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 JOIN v_cp_validated_designations v ON cp6.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = cp6.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN CATEGORY COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID on CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID=COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID on CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID=SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY UNCT_ADVOCACY_MODEL_ID ON cp6.UNCT_ADVOCACY_MODEL_ID=UNCT_ADVOCACY_MODEL_ID.ID WHERE cp6.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND cp6.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO'
